trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Chino Hills
There were no other sightings in Chino Hills on or around July 7th 2012
Summary: Saw a cigar shaped reflective object moving fast over chino hills.
divs: Sighting Details1. i was driving my car on the way to the bank in diamond bar. 2. the object caught my eye as it was bright and shiny like a lens flare 3. Didnt know what it was but, it had no wings or propellers. It looked like a skinny blimp 4. it was moving fast and in an area that doesnt normally have planes flying over 5. i was curious too what it may be and was looking for my phone too capture it on video. 6. it flew downwards over the hill and I lost sight of it
